Introduction

Rinon (Korean: 리논, Japanese: りのん) is a Japanee singer under LAPONE Entertainment. In 2023, she participated in the survival show "Produce 101 Japan: The Girls" where she ended up ranking 2nd place, securing her spot as a member of the Japanese project girl group ME:I.
